name: remove-whitespace-characters
title: Remove Whitespace Characters
description: Removes all whitespace, tabs, and newlines. Helps to save on tokens with Raycast AI and ChatGPT, as well as makes formatting a lot easier in Raycast AI.
author: klkvsky

commands.name: remove-whitespaces
commands.title: Remove Whitespaces
commands.description: Takes text from your clipboard and returns spaceless string
